0490/A0/05/883/001.status_value: To enhance national capacities and networking with relevant international and regional agencies and experts  an EAB member and a government official were supported to participate in the International conference on National Evaluation Capacities in Bangkok  in October 2015. To further advocate and promote a culture of evaluation in the country  a high level event  with over 90 participants representing parliamentarians  government officials  civil society organisations  private sector and other d

0490/A0/05/883/001.headline: Towards evidence based and equity focused policy making and programming  UNICEF organized training on Social Policy for parliamentarians  civil servants and representatives from civil society organizations  and trained key government officials to develop and disseminate equity profiles.

0490/A0/05/883/001.status_value: Towards integration of the Planning and Monitoring System (PlaMS) of the Government with the Bhutan Info  a team from the Gross National Happiness Commission (GNHC) visited Dev Info in Delhi. The team found the integration to be feasible but GNHC has requested to defer it until the PlaMS is fully integrated with the other national accounting and budgeting systems.
